title: iOS 15 now includes every feature first announced at WWDC 2021, just in time for iOS 16
content:
iOS 15 was first previewed in June during the WWDC21. Released in September, several features were missing with the first public availability of the iPhone’s latest operating system. Today, after six months and four major updates within this iOS cycle, Apple finally released every feature previewed during its 2021 Worldwide Developers Conference.

more…

The post iOS 15 now includes every feature first announced at WWDC 2021, just in time for iOS 16 appeared first on 9to5Mac.
description: After six months and four major updates within the iOS 15 cycle, Apple finally released every feature previewed during WWDC 2021.
